title: 许多优秀的地图现已在Minecraft Realms上可用

标题：Realms is packed with awesome maps
Mojang：许多优秀的地图现已在Minecraft Realms上可用
原作者：Owen 发布时间：2014年10月24日
Minecraft Realms is getting even more exciting! We’ve packed it to the brim with fresh mini-games, maps to spark an epic adventure, and intricate custom spawns.
Minecraft Realms变得愈发激情澎湃了！我们在Realms中装满了优秀的小游戏、地图，以便让玩家们创建自己传说般的探险，并去探索那些错综复杂的地图们。

Realms gives you and your friends a persistent Minecraft world. It doesn’t matter if the host is online or what time of day it is; Realms worlds are always available for building, adventuring, and crafting. You can start from a random seed, or choose one of our pre-installed maps. You can even switch between the two and save/restore your progress when convenient.
Minecraft Realms能够给你和你的朋友们一个一直在线的Minecraft世界！无论开服的人在还是不在，无论是一天的任何时间， Realms的世界们总是为你敞开建筑、探险和合成的大门。你可以自己选择一个随机的种子，你也可以选择我们预装的地图们，你甚至可以在这两种之间互相切换，并且在方便的时候保存/恢复你的存档。


We thought it would be good to give you a rundown of the pre-made maps currently included in Realms. Thanks to all the fantastic community members for creating these masterpieces. You are all talented and generous and lovely.Learn more about Realms by visiting our website or checking out the subreddit.
我们觉得各位可以先看看我们已经预载的地图！感谢那些为我们制作这些好玩的小游戏的地图大师们。你们富有才华、慷慨又有爱。
你可以在我们的网站上了解更多关于Realms的信息，当然，你也可以去Reddit版块上看看。

由 JesperTheEnd 制作的 Bloxorz【YouTube：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zMYudd_RHNU】Bloxorz is an homage to popular Flash game… erm… Bloxorz. It’s a puzzler that rewards forward planning and good brainwork. Check out some cool footage of the game in the video above but bear in mind that the level editor is not available in the Realms version. That said, all 33 levels from the original are, so don’t stress too much.
Bloxorz 是对一个很流行的Flash小游戏的致敬。它是一个能够增强你的向前思考的能力和脑力的一个小游戏。你可以在上面的视频里看到游戏的一些片段，但请知道在Realms中你无法使用地图编辑器。所以说Realms中仅会包含原有的33关。
由Musclecraft (MaxSizeIs) 制作的 Color Cube【YouTube：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E6Z2ZvxTlzA】Color cube is a tactical minigame that’s all about claiming territory. Players paint the level their own color by running around one of nine available maps, and doing their best not to fall off the ever-changing landscape. There are even powerups to help spice up the gameplay. Play it with a bunch of friends for maximum fun.
Color cube是一个关于圈地的战略性小游戏。玩家们通过在九个可用的地图中跑来跑去来将脚下的土地染成自己的颜色，并且在同时避免自己从不断变化的地形上掉下。游戏中还有增加游戏性的增益效果。与一群朋友们一起玩吧，欢乐无限！
由Xisuma & Eease 制作的Diamond Defender【YouTube：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oXbvsptWUgA】Diamond Defender is another innovative minigame. This one tasks players with surviving a terrifying ten waves of creeper attacks while protecting your stash of precious diamonds. Not one for the faint of heart but a bundle of creeper-based mayhem.
Diamond Defender是一个挺有创意的小游戏。玩家们唯一的任务是在10波苦力怕的进攻中保护你的钻石堆。这个游戏中你可要面对苦力怕而造成的混乱哦！承受不住激动的人勿入！

由QMagnet 制作的Diversity 2【YouTube：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gUqBcCh4LVY】Diversity 2 is a Complete the Monument-style minigame. That means that players need to find or earn specific blocks to “complete” the map. The extra cool thing about Diversity 2 is that those blocks are earned through completing a bunch of challenges in specific zones. You should definitely check this one out; Marc Watson – the adorable and much-loved guy from Minecraft support – lists this as one of his favourite maps of all time!
Diversity 2是一个里程碑式的小游戏。里程碑式代表着玩家们需要找到并且获得特定的方块来完成整个地图。这个地图最酷的一点是在于你需要通过许多关卡来获得那些特定的方块。你一定要看看！Mark Watson - Minecraft支持团队里的一个人  这是他最喜欢的地图！
由AKAMC 制作的Knockback Madness【https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HwPAW0Pb7dA】Knockback Madness is a chaotic mixture of player versus player combat and vertigo-inducing parkour. Players use their Minecraft combat skills to take out the other players using deadly weapons while avoiding their enemies’ advances. Competitive stuff for fans of intense combat!
Knockback Madness是一个有趣的PVP小游戏，里面还有令人眩晕的跑酷。玩家们使用他们在Minecraft里练就的战斗技巧来使用强大的武器来击败别人，同时还要躲避其他人对他们的攻击。绝对是PVP迷的好地图！

由SethBling 和 Cubehamster 制作的Missile Wars【译者强烈推荐】【YouTube：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wMCrEs1yW9w】Missile Wars is a conveniently descriptive title for this cracking minigame. Players launch TNT and Slime Block missiles at each other’s bases while trying to defend their own by defusing opponents’ missiles with skilled marksmanship. You can even ride your own warhead across the map! Awesome stuff.
Missile Wars这个小游戏正如其名。玩家们可以向对方的基地发射由TNT和史莱姆方块组成的导弹，同时还要努力防守自己的基地，避免被对手攻破。你甚至可以骑在你的导弹上！强烈推荐！
由SethBling 制作的Pizzaspleef【YouTube：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L_39RxKj0pk】Pizzaspleef is SethBling’s innovative take on the classic Minecraft mini-game, Spleef. The objective is to be the last players standing on a giant pizza. Players earn bonuses such as super speed or jump boosts by mining each of the toppings . It’s a deliciously chaotic quest for glory!
Pizzaspleef 是 SethBing 制作的一个掘方块的改版。你的目标是成为站在披萨上的最后一个人！玩家们可以通过挖掉披萨上面的佐料来获得诸如超快速和超级跳的增益。真是个美味而又令人激动的任务！

由Blockworks 制作的Raider’s Refuge
Raiders Refuge is an exciting survivial map in Realms. Start your game here and you’ll spawn in a majestic settlement sitting on a rugged coastline. It’s perfect for playing out pirate fantasies before venturing into the unknown.
Raiders Refuge是一个令人激动的生存地图。你将会出生在一个崎岖海岸旁的雄伟的乡村中。在未知中冒险前，圆一次海盗梦是不错的。

由Vechs 制作的Spellbound Caves【YouTube：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T2VkmKNPQf4】Spellbound Caves is a Complete the Monument map by Vechs – one of the pioneers of the genre. It’s one part of his Super Hostile series which is notorious for it’s challenging nature. I’m sure you’ve got the skills required though – you look like a hardy crafter.
Spellbound Caves是一个由Vechs制作关卡式的小游戏，是这一类游戏的先去。这个地图是他的Super Hostile系列地图之一，并且这一系列以它的探险内容而著称。我觉得你的技术一定够格，你看上去像是一个厉害的矿工

由Blockworks 制作的Winter Stronghold
Winter Stronghold is our second survival map. Instead of beginning your adventure in a random spawn, players start in this prebuild stronghold complete with all its wintery charm. Gather supplies, plan your journey, then head into the wild.
Winter Stronghold是我们的第二个生存地图。你并不会在一个随机的出生点重生，你将会在一个已经建好的有着冬日魅力的据点重生。获取资源，筹划你的旅程，并向着自然进发吧！
That’s it for now! Hope you enjoyed this rundown. Visit our Realms site for more.Have a great weekend everyone,
就这么多了！希望大家喜欢，请访问Realms商店来了解更多。
祝大家周末快乐Owen – @bopogamel
